CustomField.description: If selected, availability displays in hours in the Resource Availability column in the Resource Planner. If deselected, availability displays as a percentage. This value is deselected by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, availability displays in hours in the Resource Availability column in the Resource Planner. If deselected, availability displays as a percentage. This value is deselected by default.
CustomField.label: Resource Availability in Hours
